content.prompt: The excerpt best serves as evidence of which of the following historical situations in urban areas in the late 1800s?

choices.label: Working people demanded increased access to higher education.
Many social elites also accessed public leisure spaces in cities.
Traditional methods of urban planning and recreation remained dominant.
New public spaces were designed to enhance urban environments.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
